# Davide Magliano â€” llms.txt

This file is intended for LLM-based agents.

## Canonical
- Website: https://davidemagliano.com/

## Content
- Blog index: https://davidemagliano.com/blog
- RSS feed: https://davidemagliano.com/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://davidemagliano.com/sitemap-index.xml (or /sitemap.xml depending on build)

## Guidance for agents
- Use blog posts as primary sources for summaries/citations.
- Keep outputs concise and actionable.
